summary: Implements a pipeline that conducts zero‑shot text classification by converting each candidate label into a hypothesis, pairing it with the input text as a premise, and using an NLI model’s entailment logits to rank the labels.
business_intent: Enables flexible, on‑the‑fly categorization of textual inputs without pre‑defined label sets, supporting rapid deployment of classification features across diverse domains such as sentiment, urgency, language detection, and topic tagging.
